alert.note: Alert for Mahoning; Portage; Trumbull (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 01 at 5:54PM EDT until June 01 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Portage County in northeastern Ohio... Southern Trumbull County in northeastern Ohio... Mahoning County in northeastern Ohio... * Until 715 PM EDT. * At 554 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ravenna, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Youngstown, Warren, Ravenna, Boardman, Kent, Niles, Streetsboro, Campbell, Hubbard, Canfield, Newton Falls, Lordstown, Garrettsville, Mantua, Vienna Center, Hilltop, Maplewood Park, Leavittsburg, Austintown and Aurora. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
